name: Pattern

methods.name: compile
methods.description: Compiles the regular expression into a Pattern object.

methods.name: matcher
methods.description: Creates a Matcher object that matches the input string regExp against this Pattern object.

methods.name: matches
methods.signature: public static Boolean matches(String regExp, String stringtoMatch)
methods.description: Compiles the regular expression regExp and tries to match it against the specified string. This method returns true if the specified string matches the regular expression, false otherwise.

methods.name: pattern
methods.description: Returns the regular expression from which this Pattern object was compiled.

methods.name: quote
methods.description: Returns a string that can be used to create a pattern that matches the string yourString as if it were a literal pattern.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Returns a list that contains each substring of the String that matches this pattern.

methods.name: split
methods.signature: public String[] split(String regExp, Integer limit)
methods.description: Returns a list that contains each substring of the String that is terminated either by the regular expression regExp that matches this pattern, or by the end of the String.

description: Represents a compiled representation of a regular expression.
